name: @nihilux/roon-web-stack
description: a web stack, from api to web client, to use roon ia a browser
author: nihil@nihilux.org

scripts.build: bun run build:model && bun run build:eslint && bun run build:client && bun run build:api && bun run build:ng
scripts.build:debug: bun run build:model && bun run build:eslint && bun run build:client && bun run build:api-debug && bun run build:ng
scripts.build:model: bun run --filter @nihilux/roon-web-model build 2>/dev/null || echo 'No build script for model'
scripts.build:eslint: bun run --filter @nihilux/roon-web-eslint build 2>/dev/null || echo 'No build script for eslint'
scripts.frontend: bun run build:client && bun run --filter @nihilux/roon-web-ng-client start
scripts.ci: bun install --frozen-lockfile && bun run clean && bun run build && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.install:cd: bun install --filter @nihilux/roon-web-client --frozen-lockfile --production && bun install --filter @nihilux/roon-web-api --frozen-lockfile --production && bun install --filter @nihilux/roon-web-ng-client --frozen-lockfile
